Judul: No cost crisis for space telescope
Abstrak:
Your report on NASA’s next large space telescope, the WideField Infrared Survey Telescope
(WFIRST), misleadingly implies that NASA’s darkenergy probe faces a cost crisis (Nature 546, 195; 2017). NASA has not yet completed the work of estimating the costs of the mission and is not facing funding difficulties, let alone a crisis.
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
Sumber: 20 J U LY 2017 | VOL 547 | NAT U R E | 281
